useEffect(()=>{const handleClickOutside=event=>{if(dropdownRef.current&&!dropdownRef.current.contains(event.target)){setDropdownOpen(false);}};if(dropdownOpen){document.addEventListener("mousedown",handleClickOutside);return()=>{document.removeEventListener("mousedown",handleClickOutside);};}// Always return a cleanup function, even if empty
